detailsOfAchievement: Shri Lohana Sthapit Mahila Vikas Gruh Trust SLMVGT established in 1953 is having 3 main activities. In chhatralay 24h and 7d shelter with Lodging Boarding Security and training is provided to destitute women. In PTC college, we run 2 years primary teachers course. In Uchhatar Kanya Chhatralay dept Hostel facilities are provided to about 300 girls coming from all over Gujarat for higher education purpose. In this way, SLMVGT contributes to a true social service of women welfare.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Purpose: Shri Lohana Sthapit Mahila Vikas Gruh was established in 1953 with the basic purpose of woman development/ empowerment. To serve this purpose, under the provisions of Orphanages and other charitable homes(supervision and control) Act 1960, Trust has taken Licence from Mahila ane Bal vikas department of Government of Gujarat. Source of Fund: 1. Hostel Fees 2. Rent Income. 3. Interest Income.
